nodes.text: Caske was a male individual who served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Shortly after the Battle on the planet Hoth, Caske held the rank of Major and served within the Alliance High Command. He served as the High Command's contact for Rebel cells operating in the Tapani sector, passing on any missions or requirements Command had of the cells, and arranging for the delivery of any special equipment they needed.

Caske was first mentioned in the campaign guide included in Lords of the Expanse, a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games released in 1997. The book was written by Paul Sudlow and Chris Doyle, and gave Caske as an example ally for any Rebel aligned players, although it did not reveal Caske's species.
